descriptionHtml:
VERSION 1.0: 
Nothing much to say, Increase all weapons damage by 45-50% (Hope I didn\'t missed any) =)
Put in Skyrim Data and check it in Loading screen. =3

VERSION 2.0
Based on one of comments >_> I made a second option that is a little diffrent.
- Iron + Steel weapon +50% damage
- Orcish +50% damage and additional +1 for Axes
- Elven +50% -1 (Except +1 for Swords)
- Dwarven +50% -1 (Except +1 for Hammers)
- Glass, Draedic, Ebony +50% -2  <--- This is the power order now.

So basicly High level weapons are a little weaker (Glass, Draedic and Ebony for about 5-10%) and Mid level weapons has their specific (Elven for Swords, Orcish for Axes and Dvarven for Hammers)

I increase also creeps weapon damage like Falmers or Traps! ^.^
author: KravixPL
